data.title: Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation Residency
data.meta_description: Approximately three to five times per year visiting professors are brought in for a series of resident lectures. Find out more.
data.text:
As part of the Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation Residency Program, approximately three to five times per year visiting professors are brought in for a series of resident lectures followed by a noon time MEC. This exposes our resident staff to nationally known experts for both educational and networking purposes. Among the visiting professors who have lectured at Carolinas Medical Center over the past years are:

2023 Visiting Professor

Monica Verduzco-Gutierrez, MD

Professor and Distinguished Chair of the Dept. of PM&R - Long School of Medicine, University of Texas Health

Medical Director of Critical Illness Recovery and Neuro Rehabilitation - Warm Springs Rehabilitation Hospitals

Chief of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation Service Line - University Health Hospital System

San Antonio, Texas
